Name: condition_project_active
Description: Only consider projects that are in an active status

Name: condition_worker_available
Description: Only include workers whose status is 'available'

Name: condition_sprint_current
Description: Apply velocity goal only to the most recent sprint

Name: condition_blocker_unresolved
Description: Consider only blockers that have not been resolved

Name: condition_high_priority_feature
Description: Focus on features with 'High' or 'Critical' priority

Name: condition_team_has_scrum_master
Description: Ensure the team has an assigned Scrum Master

Name: condition_story_estimated
Description: Only include user stories that have story points assigned

Name: condition_sprint_has_goal
Description: Only evaluate sprints that have a defined goal

Name: condition_certified_skills
Description: Prefer skills that are officially certified

Name: condition_release_planned
Description: Only include features that are part of a planned release
